page.title: 10CLUBS IN THURSTON
page.content:
1 THE WOMEN'S INSTITUTE-THE WI
This is a club for women aged 18 and over. They go to places of interest. Mostly they meet in the Village Hall, when someone comes to talk to them.It is a club where you can meet and chat to your friends and see new people.They have about 70 members.
2 THURSTON QUILTERS
This is a group of 8 ladies with an interest in patchwork and quilting. They meet once a fortnight in each other's homes to exchange fabrics and ideas,and help each other with their work.
